---
title: "Bigfoot Sightings"
output: html_notebook

load BFRO sighting report from Kaggle dataset
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggmap)

bfro_data<-read_csv("bfro-report-locations.csv")
bfro_data_states<-bfro_data %>% 
  select(-title) %>% 
  mutate(ggloc=c(longitude,latitude))


geo_information <- revgeocode(c(-97.358112, 37.683829), output = "more")

geo_information$locality
# [1] Wichita
# Levels: Wichita

geo_information$administrative_area_level_1
# [1] Kansas
# Levels: Kansas
```
